coredriver.name: dco
coredriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Digital Content Objects]
coredriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[The most standard access to a digital content objects repository.]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Path]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Real path to the root folder on the server]

param.name: CREATE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Create]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Create folder if it does not exists]

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Creation Mask]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.]

param.name: PURGE_AFTER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Purge Days]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Option to purge documents after a given number of days. This require a manual set up of a CRON task. Leave to 0 if you don't wan't to use this feature.]

param.name: DATA_TEMPLATE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Data template]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to a directory on the filesystem whose content will be copied to the repository the first time it is loaded.]

global_param.name: PROBE_REAL_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Real Size Probing]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use system command line to get the filesize instead of php built-in function (fixes the 2Go limitation)]

global_param.name: USE_POSIX
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Use POSIX]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use php POSIX extension to read files permissions. Only works on *nix systems.]

global_param.name: USE_XSENDFILE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[X-SendFile Active]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Delegates all download operations to the webserver using the X-SendFile header. Warning, this is an external module to install for Apache. Module is active by default in Lighttpd. Warning, you have to manually add the folders where files will be downloaded in the module configuration (XSendFilePath directive)]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_METASOURCES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Metasources]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all repositories created with this driver]
